verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> K'far-Nachum <S%G2584><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> some days <S%G2250><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it was noised <S%G191><s%> <S%G5681><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> were gathered together <S%G4863><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> there was <S%G5562><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> room to receive <S%G5562><s%> <S%G5721><s%> them, no, not so much <S%G3366><s%> as about <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he preached <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, bringing <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5723><s%> one sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, which was borne <S%G142><s%> <S%G5746><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> four <S%G5064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> come nigh <S%G4331><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the press <S%G3793><s%>, they uncovered <S%G648><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the roof <S%G4721><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they had broken it up <S%G1846><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, they let down <S%G5465><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the bed <S%G2895><s%> wherein <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> <S%G5711><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G5769><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> reasoning <S%G1260><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>,

Why <S%G5101><s%> doth <S%G2980><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man thus <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%> blasphemies <S%G988><s%>? who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G5721><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G1520><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> perceived <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5631><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they so <S%G3779><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> <S%G5736><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> reason ye <S%G1260><s%> <S%G5736><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

Whether <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5629><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, Thy sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G5769><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>; or <S%G2228><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, Arise <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5669><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5657><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5720><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5762><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G5721><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, (he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>,)

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> he arose <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, took up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> before <S%G1726><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>; insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they were <S%G1839><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G1839><s%> <S%G5733><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5721><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G1492><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> it on this fashion <S%G3779><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> resorted <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5711><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5707><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as he passed by <S%G3855><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Levi <S%G3018><s%> the son of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the receipt of custom <S%G5058><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5720><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that <S%G1722><s%>, as Yeshuw`a <S%G846><s%> sat at meat <S%G2621><s%> <S%G5738><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>, many <S%G4183><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> sat <S%G4873><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> together with <S%G4873><s%> <S%G5711><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G846><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, they said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, How <S%G5101><s%> is it that <S%G3754><s%> he eateth <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinketh <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5719><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>?

When <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> it, he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, They that are whole <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5723><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of the physician <S%G2395><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> they that are <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>: I came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> used <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> to fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5723><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why do <S%G1302><s%> <S%G3522><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3361><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>? as long as <S%G3745><s%> <S%G5550><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%>, they cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5721><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5695><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken away <S%G522><s%> <S%G5686><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5692><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

No man <S%G3762><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> seweth <S%G1976><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> an old <S%G3820><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>: else <S%G1490><s%> the new piece <S%G2537><s%> that filled it up <S%G4138><s%> taketh away <S%G142><s%> <S%G5719><s%> from <S%G846><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5736><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> putteth <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%>: else <S%G1490><s%> the new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> doth burst <S%G4486><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> is spilled <S%G1632><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> will be marred <S%G622><s%> <S%G5698><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> must be put <S%G992><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that he <S%G846><s%> went <S%G3899><s%> <S%G5738><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the corn fields <S%G4702><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, as they went <S%G3598><s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, to pluck <S%G5089><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the ears of corn <S%G4719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> do they <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Torahful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5748><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Have ye never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> <S%G5627><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5627><s%> need <S%G5532><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was an hungred <S%G3983><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, he <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that were with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

How <S%G4459><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in the days <S%G1909><s%> of Evyatar <S%G8><s%> the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the shewbread <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Torahful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5748><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> but for <S%G1508><s%> the Kohanim <S%G2409><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them which were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, The sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, and not <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>:
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>.
